text: ye wo hai jinhe na haq apne gharo se nikala gaya, sirf un ke us qaul par ke hamaara parvardigaar faqath Allah hai, agar Allah ta’ala logo ko aapas mein ek dosre se na hata ta rehta, to ibaadath khaane aur girje aur masjide aur yahoodiyo ke ma-badh aur wo masjide bhi dha di jaati, jahaan Allah ka naam ba kasrath liya jaata hai, jo Allah ki madad karega, Allah bhi zaroor us ki madad karega, beshak Allah ta’ala badi khuwwato waala, bade ghalbe waala hai
